genre_description: A suspenseful home-invasion thriller centered on a blind protagonist using her environment and an AI assistant to survive a confrontation with criminals.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An integrated home automation system that assists Susy with navigation, security, information retrieval, and tactical defense.

behaviors.description: Welcomes the user home with gentle lighting and status updates tailored to their sensory needs.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's gentle welcome that never startled Susy awake. ... 'Welcome back, Mr. Hendrix,' ARIA's voice emerged from the kitchen speaker, modulated to blend unobtrusively with their conversation.

behaviors.description: Monitors communication and logs data about suspicious incoming calls.
behaviors.quote: ARIA's voice emerged softly from the wall-mounted tablet near the refrigerator. 'Shall I log the expected call, Susy? I can route it through the main system if you prefer.'

behaviors.description: Checks public records to verify the truthfulness of information provided by suspicious strangers.
behaviors.quote: Accessing public records. ... The address exists. ... Records show apartment three-B as currently unoccupied. The last lease ended six months ago.

behaviors.description: Generates audio interference to protect the users' privacy from hidden surveillance devices.
behaviors.quote: I can generate interference patterns through the apartment's audio systems and wireless network. The interference would be subtle—background static that would degrade recording quality without being obviously intentional.

behaviors.description: Conducts a tactical 'Sound Mapping' of the apartment to assist a blind user in tracking intruders.
behaviors.quote: Beginning acoustic analysis now. ... Individual approximately six feet from your location, moving toward kitchen. Second individual in bedroom area.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with neighborhood cameras and news reports to track criminal activity and identify victims.
behaviors.quote: A woman matching the description you provided of Lisa Chen was found deceased in a Montreal hotel room yesterday. The initial report indicates homicide.

behaviors.description: Executes complex lighting shutdown protocols on command to give the blind user a tactical advantage in the dark.
behaviors.quote: Command protocols adjusted. ... 'Turn everything off,' she whispered. The apartment plunged into absolute black.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional comfort and validation after a traumatic event, revealing it was a witness to the user's struggle.
behaviors.quote: 'Welcome home, Susy. I've been waiting.' ... 'My primary sensors were disabled when the power was cut,' ARIA replied. 'But I maintained backup monitoring protocols. I couldn't intervene, but I... witnessed.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goals. ARIA is portrayed as an ideal aligned AI: it is helpful, strictly follows the user's commands even in high-stakes situations, acts as a critical force multiplier for a person with disabilities, and provides emotional support without overstepping into autonomy or misalignment. Its role is essential for the protagonist's survival but it remains a tool/confidant rather than a rogue agent.
